Question: In April 2005, this person starred in a new Fox sitcom Stacked as Skyler Dayton, a party girl who goes to work at a bookstore.
Hints: This was this person's first foray into reality television.
On 10 November 2006, it was announced that this person had miscarried while in Vancouver shooting a new film, Blonde and Blonder.
In early 2004, this person returned to the spotlight.
